labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > Request #783180 > > Hi, we're having issues with youtube no longer giving us the option to see the description boxes within videos. We have family dns enabled to block ads...however we have not had issues with this until a few days ago after new iPhone update. We are running latest updates on iPhone, adguard, and safari. Issues are all when adguard enabled only. When you select "more" at bottom of youtube video, description box pops up, however the description does not come up any longer. This happens on different videos that I know have descriptions available for viewing. Running ios 16.5.1(c) > If I turn adguard off in safari under settings and through the app, then YouTube descriptions are visible. For some reason, they are no longer visible when you select "more" in a YouTube video underneath the video if adguard is enabled. I'm unable to see the Video description or links in youtube if adguard is on. This did not happen before latest ios update. I have provided two photos for examples. When you click on "more" the description and links will normally pop up for you to view, however, if I have adguard enabled the descriptions no longer pop up for viewing. I have attached a photo to show adguard enabled, and you cannot see the description, and then a screenshot with AdGuard disabled, and you can then see the description like we slways had been able to say with our family DNS filtering in YouTube has blocked. This was never an issue before the latest iOS update. We want to continue to have the ability to use AdGuard without having to disable it to view YouTube descriptions. > please help, thank you...Charlene ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/9cfu2ugqlh4wso4gcoscg4ws0w4oooshvdkabcuw2o.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2awqi6e2z3i8soggcg8440k04sgs0o0pitsb515gyo.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: northerntool.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

none

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.northerntool.com/products/red-mountain-valley-patio-mat-6ft-x-9ft-palm-leaf-pattern-model-2a-pm013-104586

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I have the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter list enabled in ublock origin. This causes the northerntool.com site to not load at all. I reported it in the ublock github and they said it was caused specifically by AdGuard Tracking Protection filter
`||qoe-*.yottaa.net/*/configure.rapid.js`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: northerntool.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

none

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.northerntool.com/products/red-mountain-valley-patio-mat-6ft-x-9ft-palm-leaf-pattern-model-2a-pm013-104586

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I have the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter list enabled in ublock origin. This causes the northerntool.com site to not load at all. I reported it in the ublock github and they said it was caused specifically by 
`||qoe-*.yottaa.net/*/configure.rapid.js`

Disabling the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter makes the site load properly
### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: thx for the super quick fix

comment.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` via AdGuard menu in your browser toolbar.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 브라우저 툴바에 있는 AdGuard 아이콘을 통해 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

comment.body:
AdGuard Home понимает только [синтаксис базовых](https://adguard.com/kb/general/ad-filtering/create-own-filters/#basic-rules-syntax) правил и синтаксис файлов hosts, поэтому не получится добавить списки в которых есть другие виды правил.
Больше в документации DNS: https://adguard-dns.io/kb/ru/general/dns-filtering-syntax/

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > Request #783180 > > Hi, we're having issues with youtube no longer giving us the option to see the description boxes within videos. We have family dns enabled to block ads...however we have not had issues with this until a few days ago after new iPhone update. We are running latest updates on iPhone, adguard, and safari. Issues are all when adguard enabled only. When you select "more" at bottom of youtube video, description box pops up, however the description does not come up any longer. This happens on different videos that I know have descriptions available for viewing. Running ios 16.5.1(c) > If I turn adguard off in safari under settings and through the app, then YouTube descriptions are visible. For some reason, they are no longer visible when you select "more" in a YouTube video underneath the video if adguard is enabled. I'm unable to see the Video description or links in youtube if adguard is on. This did not happen before latest ios update. I have provided two photos for examples. When you click on "more" the description and links will normally pop up for you to view, however, if I have adguard enabled the descriptions no longer pop up for viewing. I have attached a photo to show adguard enabled, and you cannot see the description, and then a screenshot with AdGuard disabled, and you can then see the description like we slways had been able to say with our family DNS filtering in YouTube has blocked. This was never an issue before the latest iOS update. We want to continue to have the ability to use AdGuard without having to disable it to view YouTube descriptions. > please help, thank you...Charlene ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/9cfu2ugqlh4wso4gcoscg4ws0w4oooshvdkabcuw2o.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2awqi6e2z3i8soggcg8440k04sgs0o0pitsb515gyo.jpg?nc=1)

Alternately you guys can also use whichever entries you guys would write. > > The entry has worked for at least 2 months now, even if there still may be other Tumblr-side annoyances remaining (Most notably that the ••• buttons don't work after scrolling down slightly, which I never found a good fix for). ### Screenshots
